welcome: Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock!
readRules: Would you like to read the rules? (y/n)
rules:
The rules are as follows:
- Scissors cuts paper, paper covers rock,
- rock crushes lizard, lizard poisons Spock,
- Spock smashes scissors, scissors decapitates lizard,
- lizard eats paper, paper disproves Spock,
- Spock vaporizes rock, and rock crushes scissors.
playAgain: Would you like to play again? (y/n)
userChamp: Congrats! You are the Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock Champion!
computerChamp: Sorry! The computer is the Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock Champion!
goodbye: Thank you for playing Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock! Goodbye!
